metrics.centerDescription: In 2023, over 14,300 students successfully completed training courses offered by resident companies, and more than 5,190 IT specialists were produced. Resident companies of IT Park offer more than 400 IT courses.

description: This is the hidden part of the software that users cannot see but ensures the functioning of an application or website. Backend works with databases, implements business logic, and interacts with the user interface (frontend).
project_description: The 'Al-Khwarizmi Heirs' project provides free English and IT lessons for students in grades 7-11.
project_details: The 'Muhammad al-Khwarizmi Heirs' project aims to prepare students for high-demand careers in the labor market.
project_goal: By 2028, this system will be implemented nationwide in three stages, resulting in 50,000 skilled graduates ready for the job market.
study_title: Want to study for free at Al-Khwarizmi?
study_description: Join the waiting list for the next admission!

hero.title: "IT Talents" Program
hero.description: The "IT Talents" program provides a one-time subsidy system of up to 75 times the base calculation amount when a graduate of a non-governmental educational institution is employed in an IT service-exporting organization, and up to 105 times when a graduate with a disability is employed in such an organization.

decisions.title: Program-related decisions
decisions.document1: Decree No. PQ-51 of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated February 1, 2024, "On additional measures to support the activities of training qualified specialists in the field of digitalization"
decisions.document2: Decree No. 86 of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated February 12, 2024, "On measures to support the activities of training qualified specialists in the field of IT services export"
